description:
Makoto is one of the new freshman members of the kendo club, who turns out to be Iwasa`s little brother. He is patient, polite and cool-headed, unlike his brother who is a delinquent. Makoto is a total beginner when it comes to kendo. He was impressed when he observed Tamaki doing kendo, which makes him more motivated to join the kendo club. Makoto`s kendo gear was given to him by his brother.
Source: wiki
name: Iwasa Makoto
